Statements.Statement:
select `menu`.`MenuId`, `menu`.`ParentId`, `menu`.`MenuName`, `menu`.`MenuType`, `menu`.`Namespace`, `menu`.`FormName`, `menu`.`OrderSeq`, `menu`.`DepthNo`, `menu`.`UseYn`
from tb_menumaster AS menu where UseYn = 'Y' and DelYn != 'Y' order by depthNo, orderseq;

select `menu`.`MenuId`, `menu`.`ParentId`, `menu`.`MenuName`, `menu`.`MenuType`, `menu`.`Namespace`, `menu`.`FormName`, `menu`.`OrderSeq`, `menu`.`DepthNo`, `menu`.`UseYn`
from tb_menumaster AS menu where 1=1
and menu.ParentId = @ParentId
order by depthNo, orderseq;
